remarks: Property of the additive identity endormorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2014.)
statement:
tendo0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendo0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendo0.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.

tendo0.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendo0pl.p $e |- P = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) $.
tendo0plr $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( S P O ) = S ) $.
